remarks:
3-variable restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-2012.) 

---

 3-variable restricted existentional specialization, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-2012.)
statement:
rspc3v.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
rspc3v.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
rspc3v.3 $e |- ( z = C -> ( th <-> ps ) ) $.
rspc3ev $p |- ( ( ( A e. R /\ B e. S /\ C e. T ) /\ ps ) -> E. x e. R E. y e. S E. z e. T ph ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d C z $.
$d R x $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y z $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps z $.
$d th y $.
